Enum ConfigCategory

  • Defined in File config_manager.h

Enum Documentation

enum class ConfigCategory

Enumeration of configuration setting categories.

Configuration settings are organized into logical categories to improve organization, validation, and help system functionality. Each setting belongs to exactly one category, which determines how it’s displayed in help output and configuration templates.

Values:

enumerator GENERAL

General application behavior and defaults.

enumerator EXTRACT

Data extraction parameters and thermodynamic settings.

enumerator JOB_CHECKER

Job status checking and file organization options.

enumerator PERFORMANCE

Threading, memory, and performance-related settings.

enumerator OUTPUT

Output formatting, display preferences, and reporting.
